text: is a former baseball player from Japan. He played for the Chiba Lotte Marines, Yakult Swallows, Osaka Kintetsu Buffaloes and many other teams of the Japan Pacific League. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball people from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball outfielders Category:Kintetsu Buffaloes players Category:Osaka Kintetsu Buffaloes players Category:Yakult Swallows players Category:Chiba Lotte Marines players Category:Japanese baseball coaches Category:Nippon Professional Baseball coaches
title: Takenori Daita
